content: Which iconic American singer and actor, known for his hip gyrations and hits like "Heartbreak Hotel", was born in Tupelo, Mississippi in 1935?

I believe you're referring to Elvis Presley. He was indeed born in Tupelo, Mississippi in 1935 and became famous for his unique style of music, which combined elements of country and rhythm and blues, earning him the title "The King of Rock and Roll." His performances, especially his hip gyrations, were quite iconic and controversial at the time. Some of his most famous hits include "Heartbreak Hotel," "Hound Dog," "Jailhouse Rock," and "Suspicious Minds," among many others. He also had a successful career in films, appearing in over 30 movies. His life and career had a significant impact on popular culture, and he remains one of the best-selling and most influential artists of all time.
